description: Try our easy to follow 15 Minute Beef Roast With Garlic Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast beef,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,Roast,Wheat free,Dinner Made Easy,Sesame free,Beef
name: 15 Minute Beef Roast With Garlic Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tray of carrots, broccoli and cauliflower into a microwave. Microwave on high for 21/2 minutes, then remove and shake to coat vegetables in herb butter.
Prepare garlic mash as per packet instructions. Mix and let stand for 1 minute before serving.
Meanwhile, heat gravy as per packet instructions. Remove roast beef from packaging and slice thinly. Serve immediately with vegetables, mash and gravy.
